column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : To miniaturize ?
#Text=SP
#Text=: Yes .
#Text=And from the beginning you can create invisible sensors that will inform you about every movement in armies all over the world .
#Text=Then you can hand over the soldier , a new uniform made of nano which is immune against cartridges , against biology and chemical warfare .
#Text=It ’s a strong material because the nano material is 100 times stronger than steel and it weighs only 1/6 of it .
#Text=It can warm up the soldier in cold weather ; cool him in the warm weather .
#Text=It enhances his strength 3 times ; he can lift 120 kilos with one hand .
#Text=And then you can go on and say not only to protect the protector but as well to create robots as in planes without pilots and military units without soldiers .
#Text=You do n’t need a soldier ; you can run it by proxy .
#Text=Small weapons , small robots that can penetrate or perform in conditions that a human being cannot .
#Text=He is too large , too inflexible .
#Text=DS : That ’s amazing .
#Text=SP
#Text=: Then take the nano in medicine .
#Text=You can produce the smallest instruments that you do n’t have to invade the body .
#Text=You can do it from the outside control , with such tiny little instruments .
#Text=DS : Are you satisfied with the progress in the nanotechnology sector here in Israel ?
#Text=SP

#Text=: Look , I started it 5 or 6 years ago to explain to the people the importance of it , then I was instrumental in collecting several hundred million dollars that was given to the universities and the research institutes .
#Text=As a result , we have a very good group of nano experts , you see , all of the best , and now they are working with me voluntarily .
#Text=I have 30 top scientists in Israel who have developed different ideas in the domain .
#Text=This type of research can be applied to whatever you want : Alternative energy , because if you want to have solar energy , you need very large equipment .
#Text=With nano you can condense it .
#Text=The same is true about desalinization .
#Text=It can replace the uniform of humankind .
#Text=In the future ladies will have a dress .
#Text=You can press a button and it will change the color .
#Text=The nano has what has been called the lotus effect .
#Text=Lotus is a flower that keeps cleaning itself .
#Text=And so is a nano so it does n’t shrink , does n’t get dirty .
#Text=The future of the peace process in Israel
#Text="
